name: Harvest (itch) (Ender Elohim)
description:
In this game you need to make a bridge. You get experiences by doing stuff but you only able to actually use them when you die and collect it from your corpse. And you lose all resources when you die&reborn. So play carefully.

Download Harvest Linux for Linux.

 Made for GDL game jam with theme "Death in not the end.. death is progress".

Controls: 

WASD Move

Left Click for swing

P for Talents

E for Interacting

Twitter:https://twitter.com/EnderElohim
